data.title: Excellent Subs
data.text: I have ordered the lamb sub a few times.  This sub is ALWAYS excellent! I have even ordered steak subs. Excellent!

data.title: Delicious pizza, affordable price, friendly people!
data.text: Souvlaki is my new "go to" place in Manchester for pizza. Great variety of pizzas, delicious flavor, perfect crust, and extremely affordable compared to other (lesser) pizza places. And the people there are friendly and efficient. I love Souvlaki!

data.title: Great Gyros!
data.text: Souvlaki has the best Gyro meat by far in this area.We all absolutely love it! I have never tried anything else they make but we watch a lot of people walk out with pizza boxes so it must be decent too. The only cripe I have is they put the Tzatziki sauce in the bottem of the pita. I always order more sauce and half the time they forget to give it to you which isn't a problem when you eat in but makes me crazy when you do takeout .I have had better pita bread too but I'm so happy with the meat filling I let that go. Bottom line,best Gyros in the area!

data.title: Amazing pizza and great prices.
data.text: Best pizza in Manchester. A great family run business, best pizza prices when feeding my family of 8. We go here all the time. Tons of sandwich, salad, and appetizer choices if your not in the mood for pizza. My 18 year old son always gets the 2 cheeseburger plate.

data.title: First visit, and we'll definitely be back!
data.text:
We recently tried Souvlaki's for the first time, as we'd heard several people say they have awesome pizza. Well, they surely do! 

I got a small cheese pizza, and a piece of their housemade spinach pita. The pita could've been a little bit warmer, but it was very good .. would definitely get it again!

My husband got a bacon cheeseburger club, and he had asked for cooked mushrooms on it. It came with cooked onions instead of mushrooms, so he notified the counter .. and instead of just scraping the onions off and re-topping it with mushrooms, like most places would've done, they re-made the whole thing! Way to go you guys ... now that's proper service! ! His sandwich even came WITH fries .. which is unheard of nowadays! 

Upon arrival, we were greeted at the counter by a very knowledgeable and welcoming gentleman who made us feel like we've been coming there for years. Well, I can certainly see us GOING there for years. Great food, great employees, and FANTASTIC prices! 

Definitely go and enjoy this place .. there are a few tables inside if you want to eat there, and they also do delivery .. as well as obviously take-out.

data.title: My favorite lunch when it comes to Greek food
data.text: The Souvlaki sub s my favorite, came out hot, quick and very tasty. I will be back again. My favorite lace for greek food

data.title: Great food great price
data.text: Great food great price it seems like a great local restaurant.  at least I felt like a local but really the food is amazing and the price is even more amazing

data.title: Food here is always excellent!!
data.text: Authentic Gyro meat, tender and packed with flavor!  Spinach pie also excellent.  Prices are average and portions are very generous!!  Service is great. Souvlaki's has been a long time favorite of locals and we have eaten there for years.  A  true sign of excellence is that over the years the quality has never dropped a bit!  I highly recommend if you are looking for this type of food you wont be disappointed!
